member.name: T:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Actor
member.summary: Represents a player in a world. An actor can receive events using interest areas and publish events using items. Interest areas and items can be added, removed and moved within the world.

member.name: T:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.ClientInterestArea
member.summary: This subclass automatically subscribes to the of every subscribed and forwards the received events to the .

member.name: T:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea
member.summary:
Provides a mechanism to subscribe items and regions in a world.
Interest areas have
an that is unique per
a
a subscribe threshold ()
an unsubscribe threshold ()
The InterestArea subscribes to regions that overlap with the inner view radius.
Whenever an moves into a new it sends an into the region. Interest areas that receive this message automatically subscribe to the (unless AutoSubscribeItem returns false).
If the interest area moves and subscribes to a new it sends a into the region. Receiving items answer with an .
The interest area analyzes one every few seconds from each subscribed item and then checks if the item moved out of the interest area’s outer view radius. The check interval is configured with .
Interest areas can be attached to an . Once an interest area is attached it moves wherever the item by receiving all position updates from the item’s . Per default interest areas do not auto subscribe their (see AutoSubscribeItem).
member.remarks: Thread safety: All instance members require a lock on .

member.name: F:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.SyncRoot
member.summary: Locking the sync root guarantees thread safe access.

member.summary: Initializes static members of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The id for this interest area. Unique per .

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.AttachToItem(Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Item)
member.summary: Attaching an to the interest area automatically updates the interest area's when the moves. Attached item's are excluded from the auto-subscription mechanism. Detach the item with Detach.
member.remarks: Thread safety: Requires enqueuing on the item's and like all instance members a lock on .

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.Detach
member.summary: Detaches the interest area from an that was attached with AttachToItem.

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.SubscribeItem(Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Item)
member.summary: Subscribes an manually. Manually subscribed items are excluded from the auto-unsubscribe mechanism. Leads to OnItemSubscribed. Unsubscribe with UnsubscribeItem.
member.remarks: Thread safety: Requires enqueuing on the item's and like all instance members a lock on .
member.returns: false if item has been subscribed before.

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.UnsubscribeItem(Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Item)
member.summary: Unsubscribe an that was manually subscribed with SubscribeItem.
member.returns: true if item had been subscribed.

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.UpdateInterestManagement
member.summary: Updates the subscriptions that are used to detect Items in the nearby . This method should be called after changing the interest area's .

member.summary: Checks whether to auto subscribe the . The default implementation ignores the . Override to change or extend this behavior.
member.returns: True if the is not the , otherwise false.

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes the fiber used to manage the subscriptions, detaches any attached item and resolves all existing channel subscriptions.
member.param: True if called from , false if called from the finalizer.

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.OnItemSubscribed(Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Messages.ItemSnapshot)
member.summary: Does nothing. Called after subscribing an , either manually (SubscribeItem) or automatically.
member.param: The hearbeat message from the subscribed item.
member.remarks: Thread Safety: This method does not provide thread safe access to the . Instead of accessing the item directly override subsclass that contains a copy of the required values.
Thread Safety: This method is executed while having an exclusive lock on .

member.name: M:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.InterestArea.OnItemUnsubscribed(Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Item)
member.summary: Does nothing. Called after subscribing an , either manually (UnsubscribeItem, Dispose, AttachToItem) or automatically.
member.remarks: Thread Safety: This method does not provide thread safe access to the , but is executed while having an exclusive lock on .

member.name: T:Photon.SocketServer.Mmo.Item
member.summary:
Represents an entity in a world. Items are event publisher and the counterpart to InterestAreas.
Items have
a ,
a per type unique ,
a ,
with a revision number
and 3 different MessageChannels:
: for interest areas.
: Position updates for attached and subscribed interest areas. Attached interest areas move to the same position and subscribed interest areas unsubscribe when the item leaves the outer threshold (one position update is analyzed every few seconds).
: Subscribed interest areas are informed when the item is disposed in order to unsubscribe.
member.remarks: Item accessing operations are required to be invoked on the item's .

An sends this through the at the current position to the s overlapping this region. It contains a the current position and other property snapshots of the .
s that receive this message check whether to subscribe to the sender (see InterestArea.AutoSubscribeItem).
Receiving s ignore this type of message.
